_comment: All comments should be removed. Add a test tenant object to execute the smoke test against it.

TestTenants._comment: The test tenant needs to provide the following info to support the smoke test.

TestTenant01._comment1: DomainName maps to Organization parameter of Invoke-SCuBA
TestTenant01._comment2: DisplayName is the Tenant Display Name as expected in the baseline report.
TestTenant01._comment3: A base 64 encoded PFX certiificate for a service principal.
TestTenant01._comment4: AppId maps to AppId parameter of Invoke-SCuBA. The application ID of the application registration
TestTenant01._comment5: M365Enc maps to -M365Environment parameter of Invoke-SCuBA
TestTenant01._comment6: The password for the provided certificate, CertificateB64.
